description.full: Whether you’re a cheerleading pro or looking for an exciting new way to keep the beat and break a sweat, Let’s Cheer delivers authentic cheers and heart-pumping dance routines set to popular dance hits! Full version features more songs including “Shake It”, “Hollaback Girl”, and “Mickey.”
